nodes.text: Bantha four five six was an instruction code given by the droid TDL-3.5 as authorization for her to replace C-3PO as nanny to the Solo twins. However, Winter realized that bantha was not a family code, and that it was a prank by Anakin Solo who had been upset because C-3PO refused to read his favorite bedtime story; The Little Lost Bantha Cub.
